title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 353-2.2 - Polystyrene Loose Fill Packaging Ban
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 353-2.2 - Polystyrene Loose Fill Packaging Ban

State Regulations

Beginning January 1, 2022, no manufacturer or store shall
sell, offer for sale, or distribute polystyrene loose fill packaging in New

York State. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
§§
353-2.2

Adopted

New

York State Register March 30, 2022/Volume XLIV, Issue 13, eff. 4/14/2022

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
